archimate:Requirement.name: TS.1.2.2a: a) prevalence of malware and associated risks (e.g. unauthorised access to critical business applications, corruption of critical information or exposure of sensitive information)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
